name: A Hand in the Darkness
description: Follow Alex in his new stage in life at the prestigious all-male boarding school St.Michaels. He will meet new friends, but soon he will also find out his life is in danger! Will he survive his school year? Will he find true love? It's all up to you!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, XP Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX Compatible Card Storage: 400 MB available space
